00008 #include "CBaseMenu.h"

00010 #include "../../sdl/sound/CSound.h"
00011 #include "../../sdl/CInput.h"

00013 CVolumeSettings::CVolumeSettings(Uint8 dlg_theme) :
00014 CBaseMenu(dlg_theme)
00015 {
00016  mp_Dialog = new CDialog(24, 7, INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN, m_dlg_theme);
00017  m_noenter = true;
00018 
00019  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_TEXT, 1, 1, "    Adjust Volume:    ");
00020  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_TEXT, 1, 2, "  Music:              ");
00021  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 3, "");
00022  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_TEXT, 1, 4, "  Sound:              ");
00023  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 5, "");
00024 
00025  mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(2)->m_Option->m_value = g_pSound->getMusicVolume()/8;
00026  mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(4)->m_Option->m_value = g_pSound->getSoundVolume()/8;
00027  mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(2)->m_Option->m_FontMapID = 1;
00028  mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(4)->m_Option->m_FontMapID = 1;
00029  mp_Dialog->setSelection(4);
00030 
00031  mp_Dialog->m_noise = false;
00032  mp_Dialog->setInputMode(INPUT_MODE_SLIDER);
00033  mp_Dialog->processInput();
00034  mp_Dialog->setSelection(2);
00035 }
00036 
00037 void CVolumeSettings::processSpecific()
00038 {
00039  if(mp_Dialog->getSelection() == 2)
00040  {
00041   g_pSound->setMusicVolume(mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(2)->m_Option->m_value*8);
00042   mp_Dialog->m_noise = false;
00043  }
00044  else if(mp_Dialog->getSelection() == 4)
00045  {
00046   g_pSound->setSoundVolume(mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(4)->m_Option->m_value*8);
00047   mp_Dialog->m_noise = true;
00048  }
00049 }
